mapper.select: SELECT apilist.API_LIST_ID API_LIST_ID , API_NM , PRV_ORG , API_VIEW , API_RGDT , COUNT_API_USES FROM API_LIST apilist INNER JOIN API_USER_INTRS aui ON apilist.API_LIST_ID = aui.API_LIST_ID AND aui.USER_ID = (SELECT USER_ID FROM USER WHERE Email = #{email}) AND aui.STCD = '01' LEFT JOIN (SELECT API_LIST_ID , COUNT(*) COUNT_API_USES FROM API_USES GROUP BY API_LIST_ID) apiuses ON apilist.API_LIST_ID = apiuses.API_LIST_ID

SELECT DISTINCT_API.API_LIST_ID API_LIST_ID , API_NM , PRV_ORG , API_VIEW , API_RGDT , COUNT_API_USES FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT apilist.API_LIST_ID API_LIST_ID , API_NM , PRV_ORG , API_VIEW , API_RGDT , COUNT(apiuses.API_LIST_ID) OVER (PARTITION BY apiuses.API_LIST_ID) AS COUNT_API_USES FROM API_LIST apilist INNER JOIN API_USES apiuses ON apilist.API_LIST_ID = apiuses.API_LIST_ID AND apiuses.USER_ID = (SELECT USER_ID FROM USER WHERE Email = #{email}) ) DISTINCT_API INNER JOIN (SELECT API_LIST_ID, MAX(API_VIEW_DATE) API_VIEW_DATE FROM API_USES GROUP BY API_LIST_ID) apiuses ON apiuses.API_LIST_ID = DISTINCT_API.API_LIST_ID ORDER BY apiuses.API_VIEW_DATE DESC

SELECT INQUIRY_ID , INQUIRY_NM , INQUIRY_CNTN , REG_DT , PARENT_ID , inquiry.USER_ID USER_ID , user.USER_NAME USER_NAME FROM INQUIRY inquiry INNER JOIN USER user ON user.USER_ID = inquiry.USER_ID WHERE EMAIL = #{email} ORDER BY INQUIRY_ID DESC

SELECT INQUIRY_ID , INQUIRY_NM , INQUIRY_CNTN , REG_DT , PARENT_ID , inquiry.USER_ID USER_ID , user.USER_NAME USER_NAME FROM INQUIRY inquiry INNER JOIN USER user ON user.USER_ID = inquiry.USER_ID WHERE PARENT_ID IN (SELECT INQUIRY_ID FROM INQUIRY WHERE USER_ID IN ( SELECT USER_ID FROM USER WHERE EMAIL = #{email})) AND PARENT_ID = #{inquiryid}

SELECT apiapply.API_APPLY_ID API_APPLY_ID , apiapply.USER_ID , APPLY_NM , APPLY_CNTN , APPLY_DATE , RPLY_DATE , APPLY_DVCD , user.USER_NAME USER_NAME FROM API_APPLY apiapply INNER JOIN USER user ON user.USER_ID = apiapply.USER_ID AND user.EMAIL = #{email}

SELECT apiapply.API_APPLY_ID API_APPLY_ID , apiapply.USER_ID , APPLY_NM , APPLY_CNTN , APPLY_DATE , RPLY_DATE , APPLY_DVCD , user.USER_NAME USER_NAME FROM API_APPLY apiapply INNER JOIN USER user ON user.USER_ID = apiapply.USER_ID AND user.EMAIL = #{email} WHERE apiapply.API_APPLY_ID = #{apiapplyid}
